title: DHP Bonnie Twin Bed with Storage Bins Bunk, Silver
features: Sturdy metal frame construction will last for years to come. Includes 6 storage bins beneath bottom bunk making ideal for neatly tucking away books and toys.
Includes 2 integrated side ladders providing positioning convenience as well as full-length guardrails to ensure safety.
Metal slats provide the right amount of support. Metal slat base provides better air flow circulation to keep mattress fresher longer.
Perfect for any kid's bedroom or guest room making it ideal for small spaces with its versatile design.
Assembles quickly and accommodates two standard Twin-size mattresses (not included). Recommended mattress height for the top bunk is 6 inches. No box spring is required saving you even more money.
description: Style, comfort and functionality don’t mean you have to compromise or sacrifice on space. With the DHP Bonnie Twin/Twin Bunk Bed with Storage Bins, you can use the same floor space twice, if not thrice for both bedding and storing needs. This bunk bed takes on a streamlined silhouette, its simplistic frame is crafted of sturdy metal in a solid silver finish that helps it adapt to any bedroom setting. The bed frame is constructed from a sturdy metal frame with full-length guardrails, 2 integrated ladders for arrangement flexibility and secured metal slats bases that ensure stability for the sleeper and air circulation for the mattress. Designed to accommodate 2 twin mattresses (sold separately) and no foundations required, just top with mattresses and sleep the night away. What’s more, the under-bed clearance is fully optimized with six handy bins that provide you with ample space for the storage of books, toys, and extra clothes. The DHP Bonnie Twin/Twin Bunk Bed with Storage Bins is certainly the perfect solution to a growing family!
